climbs.name: The Mucci Eye
climbs.fa: John Greer, Tim Tuomey, Josh Mucci, June 30, 2013.

content.description: The crack that makes up this route is visible on the topo on page 108 of the 2013 guidebook; it is just left of the route Funny Bone.  An up-and-right crack leads to a right-facing corner; follow this to the top of the cliff.
content.protection: Micro to four inches, emphasizing one quarter to one inch.
content.location: Just left of the route Funny Bone.

climbs.name: Let the Fun Begin
climbs.fa: Brian Hamilton, Whitney Reynier, Alexandra Barbella, August 14, 2016.

content.description: This short, wide-crack route starts 55 feet left of Tunnel of Love (Tunnel of Love is the easy to see squeeze chimney listed as route “B” on page 108 of the 2013 guidebook).  Let the Fun Begin is the slightly left-leaning, low angle, wide crack/corner which leads 30 feet to the top of the formation.
content.protection: Medium to one five inch piece.
content.location: It is 55 feet left of the route Tunnel of Love.

climbs.name: Insane Clown Posse
climbs.fa: Brian Hamilton, Whitney Reynier, Alexandra Barbella, August 14, 2016.

content.description: Start in double cracks five feet right of the route Let the Fun Begin (also described as part of this sub-area on this site).  These cracks lead to a stance 30 feet up (5.8 to here).  Move five feet left to a large, flat ledge (possible to move five more feet and exit the climb here).  Continue in a steep flare which turns low-angle after a short but surprisingly awkward crux.  Make a gear belay at the top of the cliff (60 feet from the start).
content.location: It is 50 feet left of the route Tunnel of Love (Tunnel of Love is the easy to see squeeze chimney listed as route “B” on page 108 of the 2013 guidebook).
